name: Stemma
body:
# Stemma ## The dynamic checkbox tree _build on object data_ ``` var data = [ {child:'o1',text:'Option 1'}, {mineparent:'o1',child:'o1-o1',text:'Option 1.1'}, {mineparent:'o1',child:'o1-o2',text:'Option 1.2'}, {mineparent:'o1-o2',child:'o1-o2-o1',text:'Option 1.2.1'}, {mineparent:'o1-o2',child:'o1-o2-o2',text:'Option 1.2.2'}, {child:'o2',text:'Option 2'}, {mineparent:'o2',child:'o2-o1',text:'Option 2.1'}, {mineparent:'o2',child:'o2-o2',text:'Option 2.2'}, {mineparent:'o2-o2',child:'o2-o2-o1',text:'Option 2.2.1'}, {mineparent:'o2-o2',child:'o2-o2-o2',text:'Option 2.2.2'} ]; ``` _build on DOM_ ```
``` ### Example ![Semma list](http://s32.postimg.org/ca1wb6iol/semma_list.png) *** # Usage ``` var Options = new Stemma(mountElement,{options}); ``` ### Parameters * mountElement(DOM element) - **required parameter** - to bind/find checkboxes * options(Object) - optional parameter * data - bind object data to mountElement and convert as DOM elements. Data properties: * child - any string * mineparent - look for each child property to indentify relation child-parent. If mineparent equal any child property of object means that mineparent checkbox is a children of child checkbox. * text - text for label element
